More John Lucas NBA Stats »

NBA Transactions

Jun 28, 2005 - John Lucas went undrafted in the 2005 NBA Draft making him an Unrestricted FA. Oct 4, 2005 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Oct 27, 2005 - The Minnesota Timberwolves placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 31, 2005 - John Lucas, previously with the Minnesota Timberwolves, became a free agent. Dec 29, 2005 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Houston Rockets. Jan 4, 2006 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Jan 6, 2006 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jan 8, 2006 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Houston Rockets. Jan 18, 2006 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jan 18, 2006 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Houston Rockets. Jan 28, 2006 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jul 28, 2006 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets. Oct 29, 2007 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 31, 2007 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Sep 26, 2008 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Nov 3, 2008 - The Oklahoma City Thunder placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Nov 5, 2008 - John Lucas, previously with the Oklahoma City Thunder, became a free agent. Sep 28, 2009 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Miami Heat. Oct 22, 2009 - The Miami Heat placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 26, 2009 - John Lucas, previously with the Miami Heat, became a free agent. Sep 10, 2010 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Chicago Bulls. Oct 21, 2010 - The Chicago Bulls placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 25, 2010 - John Lucas, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Nov 26, 2010 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Chicago Bulls. Jan 4, 2011 - The Chicago Bulls placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Jan 6, 2011 - John Lucas, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Mar 20, 2011 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Chicago Bulls. Jul 1, 2012 - John Lucas, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Jul 26, 2012 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Toronto Raptors. Jul 1, 2013 - John Lucas, previously with the Toronto Raptors, became a free agent. Jul 22, 2013 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Utah Jazz. Jul 22, 2014 - John Lucas was acquired by the Cleveland Cavaliers, along with Erik Murphy and Malcolm Thomas, from the Utah Jazz in exchange for Carrick Felix, a 2015 2nd round pick (CLE own) and cash. Sep 25, 2014 - John Lucas was acquired by the Boston Celtics, along with Erik Murphy, Dwight Powell, Malcolm Thomas, a 2016 2nd round pick (CLE own), a 2017 2nd round pick (CLE own) and a TPE, from the Cleveland Cavaliers in exchange for Keith Bogans, a conditional 2017 2nd round pick (SAC own), a conditional 2015 2nd round pick (SAC own) and a TPE. Sep 29, 2014 - The Boston Celtics placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 1, 2014 - John Lucas, previously with the Boston Celtics, became a free agent. Oct 21, 2014 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Washington Wizards. Oct 25, 2014 - The Washington Wizards placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 27, 2014 - John Lucas, previously with the Washington Wizards, became a free agent. Feb 2, 2015 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Detroit Pistons. Feb 12, 2015 - John Lucas, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Feb 12, 2015 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Detroit Pistons. Feb 25, 2015 - John Lucas, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Feb 25, 2015 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Detroit Pistons. Jul 1, 2015 - John Lucas, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2015 - The Detroit Pistons renounced their free-agent exception rights to John Lucas. Sep 28, 2015 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Miami Heat. Oct 24, 2015 - The Miami Heat placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Oct 26, 2015 - John Lucas, previously with the Miami Heat, became a free agent. Aug 24, 2016 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Jan 7, 2017 - The Minnesota Timberwolves placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Jan 9, 2017 - John Lucas, previously with the Minnesota Timberwolves, became a free agent.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the age of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 41 years old.

What is the height of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 5-11 (180cm) tall.

What is the weight of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 166 lbs (75kg).

What is the birthday of John Lucas?

John Lucas was born on Nov 21, 1982.

Which hand does John Lucas player with?

John Lucas is right-handed.

What position does John Lucas play?

John Lucas plays the PG position.

What was the pre-draft team of John Lucas?

John Lucas was drafted out of Oklahoma State.

What high school did John Lucas attend?

John Lucas attended Bellaire High School in Bellaire, Texas.

What nationality is John Lucas?

John Lucas has a United States nationality.

Where was John Lucas born?

John Lucas was born in Washington, District of Columbia.

What is the jersey number of John Lucas?

John Lucas last wore the #11 jersey number.

Who is John Lucas' agent?

John Lucas' agent is Bernie Lee.

How many NBA seasons has John Lucas played?

John Lucas played 8 seasons in the NBA.

What are the career averages of John Lucas?

John Lucas had career averages 4.7 points, 1.0 rebounds, 1.5 assists in 242 games.

What are the career totals of John Lucas?

John Lucas had career totals of 1,147 points, 237 rebounds, 362 assists, 2 blocks, 88 steals in 242 games.

How many teams has John Lucas been on?

John Lucas played for 6 NBA teams in his career - Chicago Bulls, Detroit Pistons, Houston Rockets, Minnesota Timberwolves, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz.

When was John Lucas drafted?

John Lucas was undrafted in 2005.

What is John Lucas' career high in points?

John Lucas averaged a career high 7.5 points per game in 2011-2012.

What is John Lucas' career high in rebounds?

John Lucas averaged a career high 1.6 rebounds per game in 2011-2012.

What is John Lucas' career high in assists?

John Lucas averaged a career high 2.9 assists per game in 2014-2015.

What is the career PER of John Lucas'?

John Lucas had a career PER of 11.8.
